title: Trucker Convoy Reaches Mordor, Unlimited Growth = BAD??? 04.27.22
itunes:title: Trucker Convoy Reaches Mordor, Unlimited Growth = BAD??? 04.27.22
description:
In episode 1235, Jack and Miles are joined by Maggie Maye to discuss…  Piss Soaked Truckers return to California, receive a fitting welcome in Oakland, CNN+ Is Here And – No, Wait it’s Dead Already, TV Show Budgets Are Getting Way Out of Hand, and more!

  1. The Anti-Vax Trucker Convoy Made a Crucial Error in Messing With Oakland
  2. CNN Plus is shutting down only a month after it launched
  3. CNN takes a $100 million step into streaming today
  4. Can CNN’s Hiring Spree Get People to Pay for Streaming News?
  5. CNN takes a $100 million step into streaming today
  6. Disney+ surpasses 10 million subscribers on first day
  7. 2021 Ratings: CNN Has Its 2nd-Most-Watched Year Ever, But Sees Sharp Declines in 2nd Half
  8. CNN+ struggles to lure viewers in its early days, drawing fewer than 10,000 daily users
  9. CNN announces CNN+, ‘most important launch for network since Ted Turner’
  10. CNN Plus is shutting down only a month after it launched
  11. Netflix Loses $54 Billion in Market Cap After Biggest One-Day Stock Drop Ever
  12. Netflix Plans to Launch Cheaper Ad-Supported Plans
  13. HBO’s ‘House Of The Dragon’ Teaser Trailer Gives Us Gods, Kings, Fire, Blood, And A Whole Lot Of Targaryen Wigs
  14. How HBO Kept ‘House of the Dragon’ Costs Under $20 Million per Episode (EXCLUSIVE)
  15. The ‘Lord Of The Rings: Rings Of Power’ Teaser Trailer Brings Tolkien’s Second Age To The Screen For The First Time
  16. Every Episode Of Amazon’s ‘Lord Of The Rings’ Show Reportedly Costs More Than $50 Million
  17. Netflix, Facing Reality Check, Vows to Curb Its Profligate Ways
  18. The 'Stranger Things' Season 4 Budget Was Literally 10 Times Some of Netflix's Other Shows
  19. Stranger Things Season 4 Reportedly Has a Per-Episode Cost of $30 Million
  20. A Day on a Film Set in the Time of Coronavirus
  21. COVID Protocols Add About 5% to Film and TV Production Costs, Study Finds
  22. ‘It’s an Explosion’: Inside the Rising Costs of Making a Scripted TV Series
  23. Game Of Thrones star Jason Momoa explains reason behind huge $15 million per episode budget on Apple TV series See
  24. ‘Squid Game’ Reportedly Only Cost Netflix $21.4 Million From Their Massive Piggy Bank

FOLLOW: @maggiemayehaha

Check Out: All things Linktree

LISTEN: Want You by Ansur Brown

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
